abstract: This word has appeared in 110 New York Times articles in the past year.
snippet: This word has appeared in 110 New York Times articles in the past year.
lead_paragraph: noun: a digestive juice secreted by the liver and stored in the gallbladder; aids in the digestion of fatsnoun: the trait of being rude and impertinent; inclined to take libertiesnoun: a feeling of deep and bitter anger and ill willverb: become or make sore by or as if by rubbingverb: irritate or vex
